attributes.additional_details: To help combat youth crime and unemployment we believe that National Service should be brought back. During recent times it has become apparent that there is no sense of respect or value among a large portion our youth and that local services are proving ineffective and are at a breaking point. It would be of great benefit to both the United Kingdom and these misguided youths if we could intervene and help provide a sense of Pride both Personal and National as it is a key building block in a healthy society.
